CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Other Party Signatures") ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_DocuApi__DocuSignViewExistingEnvelope?envelopeparentid="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_DocuApi__ViewEnvelope","Correct E-Signature Document"), "_blank"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Correct E-Signature Document
